name: Time Generator
description: Generates points of time by adding (or subtracting) a certain amount of time to a starting time until a ending time is reached.

parameters.name: starting_time
parameters.description: The starting time. Use now() to get current time.

parameters.name: ending_time
parameters.description: The ending time. Use now() to get current time.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format in which the starting and ending times are expressed.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale for the starting and ending times.

parameters.name: years
parameters.description: Adds or substracts this amount of years to the starting time until the ending time is reached.

parameters.name: months
parameters.description: Adds or substracts this amount of months to the starting time until the ending time is reached.

parameters.name: weeks
parameters.description: Adds or substracts this amount of weeks to the starting time until the ending time is reached.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Adds or substracts this amount of days to the starting time until the ending time is reached.

parameters.name: hours
parameters.description: Adds or substracts this amount of hours to the starting time until the ending time is reached.

parameters.name: minutes
parameters.description: Adds or substracts this amount of minutes to the starting time until the ending time is reached.

parameters.name: seconds
parameters.description: Adds or substracts this amount of seconds to the starting time until the ending time is reached.
